text: One morning at breakfast, Diana, after looking a little pensive for some minutes, in silence; and, at this moment, I am paving hell with energy. #JaneEyre

passages.fragment: One morning at breakfast , Diana , after looking a little pensive for some minutes ,
passages.full_quote: <used>One morning at breakfast, Diana, after looking a little pensive for some minutes, a</used>sked him, "If his plans were yet unchanged."

passages.fragment: for some minutes , in silence ; and , at
passages.full_quote: He stood by her, however, <used>for some minutes, in silence; and, at</used> last, on the young lady's whispering to Elizabeth again, he walked away

passages.fragment: ; and , at this moment , I am paving hell with energy .
passages.full_quote: "Justly thought; rightly said, Miss Eyre; <used>and, at this moment, I am paving hell with energy</used>."
